item.title: Paid mobile apps gift?
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

iPhone:

[ul][li]To create the promo codes, you'll need to agree to Apple's code contract. In this agreement, you'll state that you will not go behind Apple's back and sell the codes, cutting Apple out of their 30 percent. [/li] [li]You cannot create more than 50 codes for each version of your application, so plan your marketing to make the biggest impact with those codes. It's rare, except for very large companies, that you'll need to send out more than 50 review copies, so Apple has been very generous here.[/li] [li]The codes are US only. There is no mechanism at this time for international reviews.[/li][/ul]

I plan on selling these at a lower price than the app, as a special offer type thing
